oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Bristol, Va.-Tenn., "The Twin City"
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Black and white photograph of a man standing with a mule on the state line where Bristol, Tennessee and Bristol, Virginia meet. The man is smoking a pipe and holding a long rifle. Text printed on the front of the postcard reads "Picture of a mountaineer in Virginia...his ass in Tennessee." A sign for the city is visible behind him. Features a divided back and narrative on reverse. [No. 6975]
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Men; Mules
